name: Humoniq
long_description:
Humoniq is finally fixing travel support. We make it effortless for travelers to get help and resolve issues with airlines, OTAs, and TMCs using powerful voice and text AI. 

Our team is uniquely equipped to solve this challenge. At Flightfox (YC S12), we scaled a software-based TMC to over $20M in annual sales while handling more than one million customer support requests. 

By partnering with the largest travel providers, we are on a mission to give travelers the fastest and most helpful support of any industry. We already have major customers signed and a rapidly growing pipeline of new deals.
one_liner: Finally fixing travel support with voice and text AI
